contentTypes.name: YouTube Full Width Block
contentTypes.description: Block for showing a single, big youtube video inside the page

contentTypes.name: Block
contentTypes.description: Content block that goes somewhere on a page. Can contain a title, copy, image, and optional call-to-action button.

validations.message: Only bold, italic, underline, and code marks are allowed

Only heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, asset, table, link to Url, link to entry, link to asset, inline entry, and heading 6 nodes are allowed
Call to Action text is too long, please limit to 60 characters

contentTypes.name: Page
contentTypes.description: Pages on the site that can hold content blocks

defaultValue.en-US: Pueblo Unido creates hope for and amplifies the voices of communities with vulnerable immigration status by connecting them to legal, social, and Indigenous language interpretation services.
defaultValue.es: Pueblo Unido crea esperanza y amplifica las voces de las comunidades con estatus migratorio vulnerable al conectarlas con servicios legales, sociales e interpretaci√≥n de idiomas originarios.

contentTypes.name: Home
contentTypes.description: The basic info for the home page.

validations.message: Only bold, italic, underline, and code marks are allowed

Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, asset, table, link to Url, link to entry, link to asset, and inline entry nodes are allowed
Only bold, italic, underline, and code marks are allowed

Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, asset, table, link to Url, link to entry, link to asset, and inline entry nodes are allowed
Only bold, italic, underline, and code marks are allowed

Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, asset, table, link to Url, link to entry, link to asset, and inline entry nodes are allowed
Only bold, italic, underline, and code marks are allowed

Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, asset, table, link to Url, link to entry, link to asset, and inline entry nodes are allowed

contentTypes.name: Banner Block
contentTypes.description: Full Width Banner with Heading, Text, and Call to action. Like a short hero for the middle of a page

validations.message: Only bold, italic, underline, code, superscript, and subscript marks are allowed
Only ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, asset, table, link to Url, link to entry, and inline entry nodes are allowed

contentTypes.name: Hero Block
contentTypes.description: Splash image with heading and button, usually used at the top of a page

validations.message: Please upload an image file (jpg, png, etc.)
Please select either: top, middle, or bottom.

contentTypes.name: Image Link
contentTypes.description: Image with a link and optional caption, to be used in conjunction with components like "Image List"

contentTypes.name: Google Form Block
contentTypes.description: Embed a Google Form on the page by providing the Google Form URL.

validations.message: Only values between 500 and 1500 are accepted.

contentTypes.name: Video
contentTypes.description: Video from an external service like YouTube. Build these to use in the YouTube Viewer or Grid

contentTypes.name: Newsletter
contentTypes.description: A block that contains a newsletter signup form.

contentTypes.name: LGL Form
contentTypes.description: This is a Little Green Light form. Pass in a heading for the form, and the URL to the form and you're good to go!

contentTypes.name: Image/Link List
contentTypes.description: List of Images with Links for things like sponsor logos

contentTypes.name: Image/Comic Viewer
contentTypes.description: Slidable, swipable, image gallery where you can look at an image and swipe between a group of images. Perfect for comics or multi-image blocks.

contentTypes.name: Corsizio Form
contentTypes.description: A Corsizio form embed, which allows you to embed registration or enrollment forms from Corsizio.

settings.helpText: Headline for the video (optional)
By default, the "title" is just for internal use. Select "yes" to show the title on the website, above the video
Link to the YouTube video
Optional caption to be shown at the bottom of the YouTube video
Select the size (width) of the content on desktop and wide displays. Defaults to full width if nothing is chosen. Note that this option does not affect blocks with images.
Please enter the text for the second CTA button.
Please include the link for the second CTA button.
Please indicate whether or not this link goes to an external page.
Title of the page in English
Title of the page in Spanish
Please enter a description for this page. This description appears below the page title in search result listings.
Check this box if this page should appear at the top level of the site's main navigation.
URL friendly slug (this will be the address of the page)
Choose the content blocks to show up on this page!
Choose pages to appear below this page in the site main navigation menu
Banner Heading
Custom Background Image
Subtitle or extended copy
Text for the Call to Action button
Link for the Call to Action Button
Main heading in the hero
Optional. Smaller text that will appear under the heading
Image that will be in the background of the hero block
Optional. Text for a button to appear inside the hero. If blank, no button will appear.
URL/Link for the Button
Please enter either: top, middle, or bottom.
Link that clicking on the image should go to (will open in new window)
Caption for the image. Note that this doesn't currently display on the page, but is used for accessibility
This name will help you identify the form in a list within Contentful.
To obtain this URL, go to Send -> URL from the form page.
Please enter a height value for the form in pixels. Must be between 500 and 1500.
Optional Title for the YouTube Grid. By Default this will show on the website, but you can disable it if you just want it for organizational purposes.
If the YouTube grid has a title, choose if it should show up on the page here.
Create or select videos to include in the grid.
Optional title for the video to help you find it in Contenful later. This title does not show up on the website.
Please enter/paste the URL for a YouTube video
Optional caption to show below the video.
Provide a name to easily identify this form.
Enter in the LGL form URL.
Choose "Show Title" To display the title of this block on the Website
Create or Add "Image Link" Content Items to create the list
Images to show in the viewer
Optional. Add a pixel value here (for instance 768) to set a maximum width for images. Useful for very tall content (like comic pages). Defaults to 1024
The actual "script" part of the script. It should start with /*version... and end with something like scrollIntoView();. If you're stuck, see the default value.
The <iframe> id attribute value. Please type in what is inside the quotation marks after id=. If you're stuck, see an example in the default value.
The iFrame src value. Similar to the ID, but for the src. If you're stuck, see the default value.

roles.name: Editor
roles.description: Allows editing, publishing and archiving of content

roles.name: Translator
roles.description: Allows editing of localized fields in the specified language
